name: Fun Island
description:
Welcome to Fun Island!

Play as Bluie, a small blue creature who wants to  restore the peace and fun to the island after a tyrant took over and made the island unfun.

~Controls~

X to start game on title screen, read signs, and continue dialog

Up and down in menus

Arrow keys to move around

Space to jump

Enter to pause

~Additional notes~

Don't go into fullscreen unless you want a stretched out screen.
